statements.select: select a.order_detail_id ,a.order_id ,a.ref_order_detail_id ,a.order_no ,a.stock_balance_id ,a.sku_id ,a.warehouse_id ,a.end_qty ,a.order_qty ,a.remark ,a.display_index ,a.create_time ,a.create_user_id ,a.modify_time ,a.modify_user_id ,a.if_flag ,a.end_qty - a.order_qty difference_qty ,b.item_code ,b.item_name ,b.prop_1_detail_name ,b.prop_2_detail_name ,b.prop_3_detail_name ,b.prop_4_detail_name ,b.prop_5_detail_name From t_cc_detail a inner join vw_sku b on(a.sku_id = b.sku_id)

select a.order_detail_id ,a.order_id ,a.ref_order_detail_id ,a.order_no ,a.stock_balance_id ,a.sku_id ,a.warehouse_id ,a.end_qty ,a.order_qty ,a.remark ,a.display_index ,a.create_time ,a.create_user_id ,a.modify_time ,a.modify_user_id ,a.if_flag ,a.end_qty - a.order_qty difference_qty ,b.item_code ,b.item_name ,b.prop_1_detail_name ,b.prop_2_detail_name ,b.prop_3_detail_name ,b.prop_4_detail_name ,b.prop_5_detail_name ,c.row_no ,@iCount icount From t_cc_detail a inner join vw_sku b on(a.sku_id = b.sku_id) inner join @TmpTable c on(a.order_detail_id = c.order_detail_id) where 1=1 and c.row_no > #StartRow# and c.row_no <= #EndRow# order by b.item_code ;
